title: Deploy Valentine’s wish site to a permanent Internet Computer live URL

requirements.text: Publish the current Valentine’s wish/Valentine’s Surprise project as a permanent (non-expiring) live site on the Internet Computer using the platform-provided default domain (no custom domain configuration).
acceptanceCriteria: A production/live deployment is completed successfully (no deployment error).
The deployed site is reachable via an https://<slug>.icp0.io URL (default platform domain).
The live site serves the current project content without requiring further manual steps.

requirements.text: If the deployment workflow requires specifying a domain/slug, generate and use a random valid slug that is 5–50 characters and contains only letters, numbers, and hyphens.

quotes: If the deployment workflow requires specifying a domain/slug, generate and use a random valid slug that is 5–50 characters and contains only letters, numbers, and hyphens.

acceptanceCriteria: The chosen slug passes validation (length 5–50; only [a-z0-9-]).
Deployment succeeds using the generated slug without further user input.

constraints: Use the default Internet Computer platform domain only; do not configure a custom domain.
Deploy the exact previously generated/current version of the project with no feature changes (deployment-only work).

After a successful deployment, keep in-repo references to the permanent live URL consistent with the newly deployed URL (handled by existing feature: update frontend/LIVE_URL.md and the live-URL comment in backend/main.mo).
nonGoals: Add new site features, games, or UI changes unrelated to making deployment succeed.
Set up third-party hosting, external databases, or non-Internet-Computer deployment targets.
